DOC.brief_title: Stress Echocardiography Versus Exercise ECG ( ExECG ) Women With Chest Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator plan perform prospective study woman see RACPC previous history CAD intermediate pre-test probability CAD determine National Institute Health Care Excellence ( NICE ) guideline , require functional test part assessment . All patient meet inclusion criterion meet exclusion criterion approach consent study . Patients perform great 5 metabolic equivalent ( METS ) Duke Activity Status Index ( DASI ) questionaire randomise undergoing Exercise ECG ( Ex-ECG ) Exercise Stress Echo ( ESE ) . The DASI 12-item questionnaire estimate self-reported physical work capacity convert estimate peak metabolic equivalent . Patients meet criterion , undergo pharmacological stress echocardiogram use Dobutamine ( DSE ) , include Myocardial Contrast Echocardiography ( MCE ) . Investigations continue perform per standard clinical departmental protocol describe . In addition , patient undergo carotid ultrasonography . The technique use described completeness well-established clinical practice .
DOC.criteria: Age 30 year No previous history Coronary Artery Disease Chest pain presume cardiac origin , occur last month prior clinic appointment . Electrocardiogram diagnostic cardiac ischaemia and/or infarction ( STsegment deviation > 0.5mm , Twave inversion ) .
